price: আৰু যেতিয়াই সিহঁতৰ ওচৰলৈ কোনো নবী আহিছে সিহঁতে তেওঁক লৈ ঠাট্টা-বিদ্ৰূপ কৰিছে।
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
